H0.text: What is the name for a female bear. Doe

H1.text: What is the name for a female bear. She-Bear

H2.text: What is the name for a female bear. Bearess

H3.text: What is the name for a female bear. SOW

A4.text: Bear taxon names such as Ursidae and Ursus come from Latin Ursus/Ursa, he-bear/she-bear.
